students.story: I'm a third-year medical student with a passion for helping underserved communities. My family has been struggling financially, and I need support to complete my studies and become a doctor who can serve rural areas.

impactStories.title: Mid-term Exams Passed
impactStories.description: Grace successfully passed all her mid-term exams with excellent grades. She's on track to graduate on time.

students.story: I'm studying Computer Science and have been developing mobile apps to help small businesses. I need financial support to continue my education and eventually create tech solutions for African problems.

impactStories.title: App Development Project
impactStories.description: Peter completed his mobile app project and received recognition from his professors. The app helps local farmers track crop prices.

students.story: I'm in my final year of Civil Engineering. I've maintained excellent grades and have been involved in community projects. I need support to complete my final year and graduate.

impactStories.title: Final Project Completion
impactStories.description: Mary completed her final year project on sustainable water management systems for rural communities.

students.story: I'm a first-year business student with dreams of starting my own company. My family runs a small business, and I want to learn how to scale it and create employment opportunities.
I'm studying Nursing and have been volunteering at local clinics. I want to specialize in maternal health and help reduce maternal mortality rates in rural areas.

impactStories.title: Clinical Rotation Success
impactStories.description: Sarah excelled in her clinical rotation at the local hospital, receiving praise from supervising nurses for her compassionate care.
